description: Works in the Space and Time Investigation Department of the Centre for Space and Time Management in Seiren. She is assigned to investigate Miharu`s sudden disappearance and comes to Earth, but is moved by Miharu and Yukinari`s feelings for each other and ends up returning to Earth with Miharu. Her reason for working at the department was because she`d lost her father as a young girl. However her man allergies are so severe, that her job is often compromised. She will dig a hole and hide in it, if a man accidentally touches her. On earth, she cries herself to sleep because of Fukuyama`s unwanted sexual advances.
name: Koyomi Hare Nanaka
